desc:
Use: Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain 60 attack speed. Does not stack.

Passive: Shade Sight - Grants 250 bonus night vision.
notes: The bonus night vision works during Night Stalker's Darkness ability.
attrib:
+ 120 Attack Speed
SHADE BONUS NIGHT VISION: 250
CONSUME ATTACK SPEED: 60
lore: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.
